changes.description: This update introduces a brand new contact page and enhances the overall user experience with design improvements and bug fixes.
news: Added a contact page, making it easier to reach out via email or LinkedIn, report issues on GitHub, and support the project.
updates: Redesigned the footer to include useful links and a dedicated changelog section for better navigation.
fixes: Fixed an issue where clicking on a copied item required selecting the text instead of the full card.
Improved the animation of copied items for a smoother visual experience.

changes.description: This update brings a fresh new look with redesigned UI elements.
updates: Revamped the header design for a cleaner and more modern look.
Updated the copied card design to enhance readability and usability.

changes.description: This update introduces new features and usability improvements.
news: Implemented drag-and-drop functionality to easily sort copied cards.
Added a 'Page Not Found' error message to enhance the user experience.
updates: Updated the delete button to a destructive action for clearer intent and better usability.
